title: Dogecoin Price Prediction: Can Dogecoin Pump Soon with fans like Elon Musk as JetBolt Traction Mounts
description: Dogecoin (DOGE) is barking up the crypto tree as it surges 10.2% this week. title: Tesla, eBay on Facebook, bitcoin falling: Market Minute
description: Yahoo Finance host Rachelle Akuffo examines several of the top trending stocks as part of this morning's Market Minute. Tesla (TSLA) could receive $1 billion from rival EV makers that need aid in meeting carbon emission standards in the European Union (EU). Meta Platforms (META) is testing out eBay (EBAY) listings on Facebook in select regions. Bitcoin (BTC-USD) falls below $95,000 on Wednesday with some Wall Street experts anticipating an even bigger drop in the cryptocurrency's price.
